name: Serpentine
description: Serpentine is a 1982 action computer game developed by David Snider and published by Broderbund. The gameplay and visuals are similar to that of the Konami arcade game Jungler, released the previous year. Serpentine was originally written for the Apple II and ported to the VIC-20, Commodore 64 and Atari 8-bit family.
